name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles, served on a sesame seed bun with fries.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken breast, served with garlic bread.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Beer-battered cod fillets served with crispy fries, tartar sauce, and malt vinegar.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi rolls including California rolls, tuna rolls, and salmon nigiri, served with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in your choice of buffalo, barbecue, or honey garlic sauce, served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: Slow-cooked pork ribs smothered in barbecue sauce, served with coleslaw and cornbread.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Sautéed shrimp in a garlic butter sauce served over linguine pasta.

name: Margarita Cocktail
description: Classic cocktail made with tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and agave syrup, served on the rocks with a salted rim.

name: Mediterranean Platter
description: A selection of hummus, tabbouleh, falafel, stuffed grape leaves, olives, and pita bread.

name: Apple Pie
description: Homemade apple pie with a flaky crust, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Loaded Nachos
description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, seasoned ground beef, jalapeños, sour cream, guacamole, and salsa.

name: Pho
description: Vietnamese noodle soup with beef or chicken, rice noodles, bean sprouts, basil, and lime.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms, onions, garlic, white wine, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Key Lime Pie
description: Tangy key lime filling in a graham cracker crust, topped with whipped cream and lime zest.
